text: (oru nal musa) makkal ayarntu (tukkattil paramukamaka) irunta potu, nakarattil nulaintar anku iruntu manitarkal cantaiyittuk kontiyiruntataik kantar; oruvan avar kuttattaic cerntavan; marroruvan avar pakaivan kuttattaic cerntavan; pakaivanukketiraka utavi ceyyumaru avar kuttattan korinan - musa a(p pakai)vanai oru kuttuk kuttinar; avanai mutittar; (itaik kanta musa); "itu saittanutaiya velai niccayamaka avan vali ketukkakkutiya pakirankamana virotiyavan" enru kurinar
